Kurt: ^Hey there H-harvey. Can I help you?

c-0: ^Are you okay? You really looked like you were about to pass out. It got a bit better in the second half, but still. I'm worried about you kid.
c-1: ^Those figurines you got there are pretty cool. How long have you been collecting them?

K_H2_C1: ^Oh, uh yeah. I'm fine. It was just really overwhelming for me. I just wasn't expecting that many people to show up.

c-0: ^Yeah, you guys are getting more popular. Makes sense for more people to show up and support you guys.
^Being in a band has its challenges. Let any of us know if you need a breather, okay?
^You got it. I really appreciate it, Harvey.
c-1: ^Is there anything that I can do that would help? I, and I'm sure the rest of the band, don't want you up there suffering if it's a problem for you.
^Oh, no. I'll be okay. I'm k-kinda used to it by now. Plus I have some medicine that helps. I just need to remember to take it consistently.
^I appreciate the offer though, it means a lot.

K_H2_C2: ^Oh! Those? Yeah, they're absolutely great. I started c-collecting them last year once I got into "The Three Mousekateers."
^I wanted them to just decorate my room, but then I started getting more so now I occasionally have them fight each other and p-play with them whenever I'm bored and want something to do.

c-0: ^You've been collecting them for a year now? I never realized that. I wish I knew, I would have gotten you some new ones for Christmas.
^Well, you never really came to my room before so it makes sense. I also just like to keep this stuff to myself and within my room. That way nobody can break them.
c-1: ^You play with them when you're bored? Do you not have any other hobbies or anything that you can do too?
^Oh, uh. I make origami sometimes too while listening to music. But my earbuds b-broke a few days ago so now I don't make origami as much.
^It feels weird to do it without music playing in my ears.
